public static class Embeds.Configuration extends Object implements EmbedConfig

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    @NotNull Embeds
    buildDefault()
    Converts this configuration into an Embeds instance that should be used globally.
    @NotNull Embeds
    buildError()
    Converts this configuration into an Embeds instance that should only be used by DefaultErrorMessageFactory.
    @NotNull Embeds.Configuration
    errorSource(@NotNull EmbedDataSource source)
    Adds a new EmbedDataSource that will be used by the DefaultErrorMessageFactory to load the error messages from.
    @NotNull Embeds.Configuration
    placeholders(I18n.Entry... placeholders)
    Adds one or more new global placeholders.
    @NotNull Embeds.Configuration
    placeholders(@NotNull Map<String,Object> placeholders)
    Adds global placeholders with the values of the given map, where the key of the map represents the name of the placeholder and the value of the map the value to replace the placeholder with.
    @NotNull Embeds.Configuration
    sources(@NotNull EmbedDataSource... source)
    Adds a new EmbedDataSource that Embeds can be loaded from.

  • Method Details

    • placeholders

      @NotNull public @NotNull Embeds.Configuration placeholders(@NotNull I18n.Entry... placeholders)
      Description copied from interface: EmbedConfig
      Adds one or more new global placeholders. Global placeholders will be available for any Embed loaded by this API.
      Specified by:
      placeholders in interface EmbedConfig
      Parameters:
      placeholders - the entries to add
      Returns:
      this instance for fluent interface

    • placeholders

      @NotNull public @NotNull Embeds.Configuration placeholders(@NotNull @NotNull Map<String,Object> placeholders)
      Description copied from interface: EmbedConfig

      Adds global placeholders with the values of the given map, where the key of the map represents the name of the placeholder and the value of the map the value to replace the placeholder with.

      Global placeholders will be available for any Embed loaded by this API.

      Specified by:
      placeholders in interface EmbedConfig
      Parameters:
      placeholders - the Map to get the values from
      Returns:
      this instance for fluent interface

    • sources

      Description copied from interface: EmbedConfig
      Adds a new EmbedDataSource that Embeds can be loaded from.
      Specified by:
      sources in interface EmbedConfig
      Parameters:
      source - the EmbedDataSource to add
      Returns:
      this instance for fluent interface

    • errorSource

      @NotNull public @NotNull Embeds.Configuration errorSource(@NotNull @NotNull EmbedDataSource source)
      Description copied from interface: EmbedConfig
      Adds a new EmbedDataSource that will be used by the DefaultErrorMessageFactory to load the error messages from.
      Specified by:
      errorSource in interface EmbedConfig
      Parameters:
      source - the EmbedDataSource to load the error embeds from
      Returns:

    • buildDefault

      @NotNull public @NotNull Embeds buildDefault()
      Converts this configuration into an Embeds instance that should be used globally.
      Returns:
      an Embeds instance for default usage

    • buildError

      @NotNull public @NotNull Embeds buildError()
      Converts this configuration into an Embeds instance that should only be used by DefaultErrorMessageFactory.
      Returns:
      an Embeds instance for usage inside of DefaultErrorMessageFactory
